The quote attributed to Dr: Denis Mukwege in the meme was confirmed to be false by the expert's investigation.
Dr: Mukwege did resign from his role as vice chairman of the Multi-Sectoral Coronavirus Response Committee in the South Kivu province of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
The reason for Dr: Mukwege's resignation was his frustration over slow testing and subpar preventative measures, not because he was being offered money to falsify COVID-19 cases.
